channel.title: News on Welcome to Yuan Gao's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in News on Welcome to Yuan Gao's Homepage

item.description: 1 paper (Generalizble Training-Free 3D Pose Estimation) was accepted to <font color=#0099ff>IEEE TPAMI</font>.
1 <font color=#0099ff>ACL</font> (Network Pruning) and 1 <font color=#0099ff>ICCV</font> (Knowledge Distillation) papers were accepted.
2 papers were accepted to <font color=#0099ff>ICML</font> (Multi-Task Grouping, Efficient Diffusion Models).

1 <font color=#0099ff>ICLR</font> (Auxiliary Learning), 2 <font color=#0099ff>CVPR</font> (V-L Model Robust Finetuning, Image Matching), and 1 <font color=#0099ff>AAAI</font> (Shape Analysis) papers were accepted.

For incoming PhD/master students, and undergraduate students from WHU who are interested in doing Machine Learning and Computer Vision researches with me, welcome to drop me an email with your CV attached.

I joined <font color=#0099ff>Wuhan University</font> as an <font color=#0099ff>Associate Professor</font>. I am currently working on <font color=#0099ff>Multi-Task/Modal Learning</font>, <font color=#0099ff>Efficient Deep Learning (Training & Inference)</font>, and <font color=#0099ff>3D Computer Vision</font>.
Our paper: “MTL-NAS: Task-Agnostic Neural Architecture Search towards General-Purpose Multi-Task Learning” has been accepted to CVPR2020.
Our paper: “Estimation of 3D Category-Specific Object Structure: Symmetry, Manhattan and or Multiple Images” has been accepted to IJCV.

Two papers: “NDDR-CNN: Layerwise Feature Fusing in Multi-Task CNNs by Neural Discriminative Dimensionality Reduction” and “Face Anti-Spoofing: Model Matters, So Does Data” have been accepted to CVPR2019.
Our paper: “Semi-Supervised Sparse Representation Based Classification for Face Recognition with Insufficient Labeled Samples” has been elected into ESI Highly Cited Paper.

Our paper: “Reduced-Rank Linear Dynamical Systems” has been accepted to AAAI2018.

This work was featured on JiQiZhiXin (机器之心)

Our paper: “Inactivation of KCNQ1 potassium channels reveals dynamic coupling between voltage sensing and pore opening” has been accepted to Nature Communications, where we derived a Markov Process to model the dynamic and stationary states of the voltage-dependent ion channel activation.

This work was featured on the largest Chinese online medium, such as Tencent News (腾讯新闻), TouTiao News (今日头条), Netease News (网易新闻), Sohu News (搜狐新闻), People’s Daily (人民网), JiQiZhiXin (机器之心), etc.
Our paper: “Locality Preserving Matching” has been accepted to IJCAI2017.
Our paper: “Exploiting Symmetry and/or Manhattan Properties for 3D Object Structure Estimation from Single and Multiple Images” has been accepted to CVPR2017.
Our paper: “Semi-Supervised Sparse Representation Based Classification for Face Recognition with Insufficient Labeled Samples” has been accepted to IEEE TIP.
I joined Tencent AI Lab as a senior researcher. I am currently working on Reinforcement Learning.
Our paper: “Symmetric Non-Rigid Structure from Motion for Category-Specific Object Structure Estimation” has been accepted to ECCV2016.
